channel.title: AhrimsScape developements
channel.description:
here is what i have done for today please no flame :D * credits: 50% delta, 25% aintaro, 25% me this is dragon-history source client credits: 25% delta, 25% aintaro, 50% umah
i have added armadyl helm and slayer helm edited d claws hits so they aren't "overpowered" [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/customs.jpg[/img]
made an npc tele you to an area with 3 tormented demons for 100k they now drop d claws, and d plate (creds to me for adding d plate) [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/tormenteddemonguy-1.jpg[/img] he teles here is the area with td's [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/tormenteddemons.jpg[/img]
made a custom zamorak god area and added drops to him and lowered hp he now drops full statius(added stats to statius) and zgs [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/zamorakgod-1.jpg[/img]
armadyl area (cred to aintaro) added drops such as ags, full armadyl and full morrigans creds to me for adding drops [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/armagod.jpg[/img]
lowered d claws hits as they were overpowered [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/clawsd00d.jpg[/img]
added a ::drops for newcomers! :D [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/drops.jpg[/img]
added a ::prices to keep economy unconfusing :D [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/prices.jpg[/img]
a word from me too people who use custom rares such as bronze p hat rune santa hat and stupid shit like that [IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w93/ivy82206/l0l0l.jpg[/img]

item.title: AhrimsScape developements
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

90% delta 9% to the models he added 1% to him creating two commands and moving 3 npcs.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2009, 09:31:21 am[/size][hr]and i forgot to add, you econamy will fail with those prices m8, also try fixing your inventory views, and DONT LET UR ECONAMY FAIL 10m for morrigans ect.

Read full topic
